Posts.Content: What is NHS? My Bryans first sirt evaluation is Thursday. We have high hopes to slow the cancer down.
Posts.Title: SIRT

Posts.Content: Hello casbah2 Oh i'm in the US we don't have NHS yet, guess thats good. My private insurance is paying for it of course had to get pre approval yes it is very expensive but in my process of looking found that SSID also pays for it if thats an option. Here is a infomative link on the procedure. http://www.y90support.org/blt/SIRTPatientPerspective.html&nb  Best of luck to all.
Posts.Title: SIRT
